https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/aR0WqxNM0P9qxmdOZAdSxiSeVW0.jpg An hour-long documentary designed to celebrate the spirit of the independent filmmaker from D.W. Griffith to Quentin Tarantino. Interview footage and film clips are blended together to form a chronological approach to the subject matter. Edge of Outside
